answers.answer: is it all foods? or just certain foods? It could be a lot of things; acid reflux, a food allergy, some sort of IBS, gastritis, an ulcer.The foods that usually cause such things are foods highly acidic (pasta sauce, coffee, tea), dairy products, garlic, spicy foods, gluten. All these foods have a habit of irritating the stomach. try to avoid them and see if that helps. If not, go to the pharmacy and pick up some nexium and see if that helps.
Diabetics can get gastroparesis, which is not very treatable, so I hope it's not that.  Do you have diabetes?

question: Why can't I eat food without a distended stomach andbelching
title: everything I eat makes me belch and have a distended abdomin
